original_title: Quick Brown Fox: An Alzheimers Story
overview: The title and opening sequence of the film comes from the old typist's test line, "The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog." As we see those words repeated over and over again on an old teletype machine, we are introduced to the unnerving pattern of Alzheimer's Disease, which often begins with symptoms like repeating the same story or phrase over and over againâ€¦ and goes on, like a broken teletype, to thoroughly mangle and jumble the brains of its victims.
title: Quick Brown Fox: An Alzheimers Story
